author: Reuters Editorial
title: Russia's Alrosa says diamonds sales at $559.5 million in March
text:
MOSCOW (Reuters) - Russia’s diamond miner Alrosa ( ALRS.MM ) said on Tuesday that its sales of rough and polished diamonds totaled $559.5 million in March.
FILE PHOTO: A man walks past the logo of Russia's diamond producer Alrosa at the entrance of the company's headquarters in Moscow, Russia January 26, 2018. Picture taken January 26, 2018. REUTERS/Diana Asonova “There was a slight seasonal cooling off in demand in March,” Alrosa Deputy CEO Yury Okoemov said, according to a company statement.
Alrosa’s total diamond sales in the first quarter 2018 amounted to $1.606 billion, the company said.
Reporting by Diana Asonova; Writing by Maria Tsvetkova; editing by Vladimir Soldatkin
